RLC Action Upon Receipt of VA Form 26-8937 From a Service Member
Upon receipt of
VA Form 26-8937
, from a service member, RLCs request an eligibility determination from the SOJ by sending an e-mail to a designated point of contact at the appropriate site.
Reference
:Â  For more information on the appropriate regional benefit offices, see
the map of regional benefit office websites
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section D - Ancillary Benefits and Other Issues Involving Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD) or BDD-Excluded Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section D
